title: Google settles “Location History” lawsuit with 40 states, will pay $392 million
description: Google also promises to change the Location History settings again.

title: Report: Apple’s mixed reality headset is just a few months away
description: The device could be announced as soon as January.

title: As more brands pull out of Twitter, SpaceX buys big Twitter ad package
description: SpaceX has spent more than $160,000 on Twitter so far.

title: How researchers used CRISPR gene editing to send immune cells after cancer
description: New trial has limited effect on cancer, but technology is likely to see further use.

title: The long, solder-heavy way to get root access to a Starlink terminal
description: Zapping the satellite board at just the right time can grant deeper access.

title: Hungry for AI? New supercomputer contains 16 dinner-plate-size chips
description: Exascale Cerebras Andromeda cluster packs more cores than 1,954 Nvidia A100 GPUs.

title: Musk trolls senator demanding answers on Twitter fake-account scandal
description: “Selling the truth is dangerous and unacceptable."

title: Dramatic “Material You” colors arrive to desktop Chrome Canary builds
description: Pick a wallpaper and the whole UI will change color.

title: When is a Porsche not a Porsche? When it’s a 2022 Audi RS e-tron GT
description: Smooth, fast, and it eats corners like they're going out of season.

title: The first cubesat to fly and operate at the Moon has successfully arrived
description: "That is a huge, huge step for the agency."

title: Twitter lays off 5K contractors in surprise 2nd wave of cuts, more mods lost
description: One Twitter contractor was laid off mid-update to child safety.

title: Steam scammers allegedly steal and sell indie dev’s free Unreal “Superman” demo
description: Scam devs also use Steam page as "evidence" for YouTube DMCA takedown.

title: How North Korea became a mastermind of crypto cybercrime
description: Cryptocurrency theft has become one of the regime’s main sources of revenue.

title: A Polestar-Tuned Polestar 2 is the best Polestar
